inventory=[{"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 63, "index": 16}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 25, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 13, "index": 32}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 5, "index": 34}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}]

thought: The first step towards crafting spruce_stairs is crafting spruce_planks. This requires placing a spruce_wood in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the spruce_wood from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
